column4: I need help setting up everquest (EQ1) on a ubuntu system, if anyone is familiar with this.
what do you want to know?
are you sure that everquest is made for linux?
well.. you can just try to do 'wine <name-of-setup-file>' and see if it works.. otherwise just install cedega and try to run on that.. but i'm not sure if it will work on any for those 2...
